sentences.en: A cameraman was killed when his vehicle came under mortar fire .
sentences.cn: 一名摄影师因所乘坐的汽车遭到迫击炮袭击而丧生。

sentences.en: As an investment, bricks and mortar are not what they were.
sentences.cn: 作为一种投资，房产不再是从前意义上的房产。

sentences.en: Even the flimsiest of science fiction or the nastiest of horror stories or the most intricate of spy novels uses this as the mortar to bond together its narrative.
sentences.cn: 即便是最天花乱坠的科幻小说、最荒唐无稽的恐怖小说和最错综复杂的间谍小说也都用这些元素作为粘合叙述的灰泥。

sentences.en: Frost and weather had eaten away the mortar.
He ground the rock candy with a mortar and pestle.
sentences.cn: 他自己动手用研钵和杵把冰糖研成粉。

sentences.en: He was killed in a mortar attack.
In Tobruk, leading a patrol in no-man's land, he was blown up by a mortar bomb.
sentences.cn: 他带领巡逻队在图卜鲁格无人区巡逻时遭迫击炮弹击中身亡.

sentences.en: Paying rent simply helps to line the pockets of landlords. It's far better to put your money into bricks and mortar of your own.
sentences.cn: 租房子只会鼓了房东的腰包，自己投资买房要合算得多。

sentences.en: So they had bricks for stone and asphalt for mortar.
sentences.cn: 于是他们用砖代替石头,沥青代替灰泥.

sentences.en: Stone bridges consist of pillars , abutments and arches made up of stones held together by mortar.
sentences.cn: 石桥由灰浆结合在一起的石头墩子 、 桥台和桥拱组成.

sentences.en: The 120mm mortar has a range of 18,000 yards.
sentences.cn: 口径为120毫米的迫击炮的射程是1.8万码。

sentences.en: The conjurer threw the watch into the mortar and grasped a sledgehammer from the table.
sentences.cn: 魔术师把表扔进臼里,从桌子上拿起一把大锤.

sentences.en: The mason flushed the joint with mortar.
sentences.cn: 泥工用灰浆把接缝处嵌平.

sentences.en: The sound of mortar fire seemed to be closing in.
sentences.cn: 迫击炮的吼声似乎正在逼近.

sentences.en: Three mortar shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
Thus I assumed the splendid garb of the scholar - black mortar - board and black gown.
sentences.cn: 从此黑方巾、黑披袍的风光也被我占着了.

sentences.en: Using a pestle and mortar, pulverise the bran to a coarse powder.
sentences.cn: 用杵和臼，将麸皮磨成粗粉。
